clothing: ceremonial armor too large for them
uniqueFeatures: an intricate tattoo visible on their neck
jewelry that jingles when they move
a limp from an old injury
a glowing rune on their forehead
fingers stained permanently by their trade
a distinctive smell that follows them
a tendency to speak in rhyme unconsciously
a knack to know what time it is
a  shadow that moves independently sometimes
a network of thin scars like a spider web
one hand is noticeably colder than the other
a quirk in which small objects sometimes levitate near them
the ability to perfectly mimic any voice they've heard
indoorAreas: Abandoned throne room with broken statues
Grand dining hall with a long table
Treasure vault with an empty pedestal
Armory with weapon racks on walls
Study with a desk covered in papers
Wine cellar filled with ancient bottles
plotHooks: Children have been disappearing from town at night, always near the old well
A dying stranger hands you a map with an X marked, whispering they must never find it
The local lord is hosting a tournament with a mysterious prize
Strange lights have been seen in the forbidden forest, and livestock are turning up drained of blood
A wealthy noble hires you to retrieve a family heirloom from their recently deceased relative
The town water supply has been poisoned, and the antidote ingredients grow in monster territory
A cryptic prophecy mentions someone matching your description as the key to preventing disaster
Your group is framed for a crime you did not commit and must find the real culprit
An old friend appears, much changed, begging for help with a situation that got out of hand
The dead have begun rising from the local cemetery, but they seem confused, not hostile
A traveling circus is actually a front for something sinister
The party discovers a hidden portal that seems to lead somewhere ancient and dangerous
A dragon demands tribute from the town, but the demand is oddly specific and strange
An artifact in your possession begins whispering to you at night
The local temple deity has gone silent, and the priests are desperate
A rival adventuring party challenges you to a race to claim a legendary treasure
Strange weather phenomena are occurring - snow in summer, eternal fog, etc.
A powerful mage offers you a job that seems too good to be true
The town is preparing for a festival, but ominous signs suggest something will go wrong
A sentient weapon chooses one party member and refuses to leave them alone
The stars have disappeared from the night sky and no one seems to remember them
A child claims to have memories of a past life as a legendary hero
All the mirrors in town have started showing different reflections
An abandoned ship appears in the harbor with no crew and cargo holds full of ice
A powerful artifact activates and brands one character with a glowing mark
The party witnesses a public execution of someone who claims to be innocent and makes eye contact
A messenger bird arrives with a letter meant for someone else entirely
The group finds a child wandering alone who speaks a language no one recognizes
A merchant offers an absurd amount of money for something the party considers worthless
Someone the party knows to be dead appears, acting as if nothing happened
The party's shadows start behaving strangely, pointing in different directions
A local leader privately begs the party to help them fake their own death
The party discovers their faces on wanted posters for crimes in a place they've never been
A stranger approaches claiming to be from the party's future with a warning

tier1.name: Torch of Revealing
tier1.effect: This torch reveals invisible creatures and objects within its light

tier1.name: Rope of Climbing
tier1.effect: 50ft rope that can be commanded to snake toward an anchor point

tier1.name: Cloak of the Chameleon
tier1.effect: Advantage on Agility Rolls to hide

tier1.name: Sword of Warning
tier1.effect: Cannot be surprised while wielding this weapon, +1 to attack rolls

tier1.name: Ring of Spell Storing
tier1.effect: Store one spell of level 2 or lower to cast later

tier1.name: Whispering Compass
tier1.effect: Points toward the nearest source of danger within Far range

tier1.name: Coin of Fate
tier1.effect: Once per session, flip to reroll any single die

tier1.name: Gloves of Sure Grip
tier1.effect: Advantage on rolls to climb or hold onto things

tier1.name: Hat of Disguise
tier1.effect: Change the appearance of your clothing at will

tier1.name: Bag of Tricks
tier1.effect: Pull random small animal from bag once per day

tier1.name: Everburning Torch
tier1.effect: Burns forever without fuel or heat

tier2.name: Oil of Sharpness
tier2.effect: Weapon deals +2 damage for one combat

tier2.name: Winged Boots
tier2.effect: Gain flight for up to 4 hours per day

tier2.name: Periapt of Proof Against Poison
tier2.effect: Immune to poison damage and the poisoned condition

tier2.name: Flame Tongue
tier2.effect: This weapon deals additional 2d6 fire damage

tier2.name: Mask of Many Faces
tier2.effect: Change your appearance at will (cosmetic only)

tier2.name: Earring of Distant Speech
tier2.effect: Communicate telepathically with someone you know within Very Far range

tier2.name: Boots of the Winterlands
tier2.effect: Immune to cold damage, can walk on ice and snow without difficulty

tier2.name: Necklace of Fireballs
tier2.effect: Contains 5 beads. Throw a bead to create a fireball (3d6 fire damage, targets make Agility Roll to halve)

tier2.name: Cloak of the Manta Ray
tier2.effect: Breathe underwater and swim speed equal to walking speed

tier2.name: Ring of Water Walking
tier2.effect: Walk on water as if solid ground

tier2.name: Pipes of Haunting
tier2.effect: Play to frighten creatures within Close range

tier3.name: Potion of Heroism
tier3.effect: Gain 2d10 temporary HP and advantage on all rolls for 1 hour

tier3.name: Elixir of Health
tier3.effect: Cure all diseases and clear all stress

tier3.name: Amulet of the Planes
tier3.effect: Cast plane shift once per day

tier3.name: Holy Avenger
tier3.effect: This weapon deals +2d10 magic damage to fiends and undead

tier3.name: Staff of Power
tier3.effect: +2 to Spellcast, can cast multiple powerful spells

tier3.name: Cloak of Stars
tier3.effect: Can become invisible in darkness, and can fling star motes (1d8 magic damage each)

tier3.name: Sword of Life Stealing
tier3.effect: On a critical hit, gain HP equal to damage dealt

tier3.name: Robe of the Archmagi
tier3.effect: +2 to Armor Score, advantage on saves against spells

tier3.name: Mirror of Scrying
tier3.effect: Can observe any creature you know, once per day

tier3.name: Circlet of Blasting
tier3.effect: Cast a powerful force beam (4d8 magic damage) once per day

tier3.name: Helm of Teleportation
tier3.effect: Teleport to visible location within Far range three times per day

tier3.name: Ioun Stone of Protection
tier3.effect: Orbits your head, +1 to all defenses

tier3.name: Carpet of Flying
tier3.effect: Magical carpet that can carry up to 4 people

tier4.name: Potion of Invulnerability
tier4.effect: Gain resistance to all damage for 1 minute

tier4.name: Oil of Etherealness
tier4.effect: Become ethereal for 1 hour

tier4.name: Ring of Three Wishes
tier4.effect: Grant three wishes (use carefully!)

tier4.name: Armor of Invulnerability
tier4.effect: Can become immune to all damage for 10 minutes once per day

tier4.name: Tome of Clear Thought
tier4.effect: Permanently increase Knowledge by +1

tier4.name: Vorpal Sword
tier4.effect: On a critical hit, target must make a Strength Roll or be instantly killed

tier4.name: Sphere of Annihilation
tier4.effect: Destroys all matter it touches, can be controlled

tier4.name: Crown of Command
tier4.effect: Can dominate any creature (they obey one command) once per day

tier4.name: Deck of Illusions
tier4.effect: Draw a card to create a realistic illusion of a creature

tier4.name: Spellguard Shield
tier4.effect: Advantage on saves against spells, +3 to Armor Score

tier4.name: Orb of Dragonkind
tier4.effect: Can control dragons, cast dragon breath (6d10 damage)

tier4.name: Sword of Answering
tier4.effect: When attacked, can make an automatic counterattack

tier4.name: Axe of the Dwarvish Lords
tier4.effect: +3 to attack, +3d6 damage, grows heavier for non-dwarves

tier4.name: Talisman of Pure Good
tier4.effect: Instantly destroy any fiend or undead (7 charges)

tier4.name: Blackrazor (Sentient Sword)
tier4.effect: +3 weapon, devours souls to heal wielder, but is corrupting

tier4.name: Staff of the Magi
tier4.effect: Most powerful spellcasting staff, can cast nearly any spell

tier4.name: Luck Blade
tier4.effect: +1 weapon, grants advantage on all saves, contains 1d4-1 wishes

tier4.name: Cubic Gate
tier4.effect: Creates portals to six different planes

tier4.name: Robe of Stars
tier4.effect: Store magic items in extradimensional space, teleport between stars

tier4.name: Iron Flask
tier4.effect: Can trap and contain powerful creatures

Human: has a weird thing about birds
Firbolg: speaks to plants more than people
